text: Kōraā, ‘tōmālōkē bhārai cōraā nā'inē, āllāhē yadi tōmālōkara śraraṇaśakti ārau dr̥ṣṭiśakti haraṇa karai laẏa ārau tōmālōkara hr̥daẏata mōhara mārai diẏē tēntē āllāhara bāhiraē tōmālōkara kōna ilāha āchē yiẏē ē'ibōra ubhatā'i diba’? Cōraā, kēnēkai āmi āẏātasamūha biśadabhāraē barṇanā karaō, iẏāra pichatō siham̐tē mukha ghūraā'i laẏa
